projects.name: AI ATTENDANCE USING OpenCV
projects.description: Developed an OpenCV-based model that records and marks attendance automatically. Scans and saves facial data in database and provides advanced functionality to attendance system.

projects.name: DRIVER DROWSINESS DETECTION
projects.description: Created a system to detect driver drowsiness using image analysis and deep learning techniques. Collected and processed images and videos of drivers to train and test the detection model. Developed a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) to identify signs of drowsiness from facial features. Achieved a prediction accuracy of 92% by optimizing model parameters.

experiences.description: Created detailed reports and dashboards using tools like Tableau, Power BI, and Excel to visualize key metrics and trends. Assisted in maintaining and updating SQL databases, ensuring data integrity and accessibility. Worked closely with cross-functional teams, Provided actionable insights that contributed to a 15% increase in marketing campaign effectiveness.

Developed a stock price prediction model using Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) neural networks to forecast future stock prices. Trained the LSTM model using Python and TensorFlow, optimizing hyperparameters to improve prediction accuracy. Documented the entire project lifecycle, from data collection to model evaluation, ensuring reproducibility and clarity.
